EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Graduate Take Over!
Have you ever fancied working at The Challenge HQ?
For the first time ever we are opening our doors and are offering a small number of exceptional candidates the chance to be part of The Graduate Take Over.
We will match you with a role coach who will help you take on the position of a CEO, a Programme Manager, a Programme Associate, an Assistant Programme Manager or PR & Advocacy Manager or Assistant. Over the course of three afternoons as a team you will research, design and plan a project, which will then hopefully be implemented.
We are looking for you to come to our Head Office, 52 Charlotte Street, Birmingham, West Midlands, B3 1PX on Tuesday 17th, Wednesday 18th and Thursday 19th February, between 13:00pm and 16:00pm. Expenses and refreshments will be provided.
We are looking for people are have the following skills and characteristics:
Team work – The ability to work effectively within a team
Enthusiasm – Be willing to try your hardest at all times
Creativity – The ability develop original ideas as a team
If you are interested in getting involved please contact vicky.harrold@the-challenge.org
